c74object.name: ears.in~
c74object.digest: Signal input for a patch loaded by ears.process~
c74object.description: Use the ears.in~ object inside a patch loaded by ears.process~ to create a signal inlet receiving data from an input buffer.

metadatalist.metadata: Andrea Agostini, partly based upon work by Alexander J. Harker

objarg.name: bufchans
objarg.description:
The first (or only) value sets the inlet of ears.process~ whose buffer data will be passed to the object, defaulting to 1.
The subsequent values set the channel numbers whose samples will be output from each outlet. If none is provided, only the first channel will be output.

method.name: int
method.description:
An integer sets the inlet of ears.process~ whose data will be passed to the ears.in~ object.
The output channels are not changed.

method.name: list
method.description:
The first element of the list sets the inlet of ears.process~ whose buffer data will be passed to the ears.in~ object.
Each subsequent element sets a buffer channel whose samples will be output from the corresponding outlet.
